caption.p: (a, c) Cyclic voltammetry (CV) and (b, d) electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) measurements performed on Li/electrolyte/LFP cells employing either (a, b) DEGDME_HCE or (c, d) TREGDME_HCE. CV potential range, 2.7–3.9 V vs Li +/Li; scan rate, 0.1 mV s –1. EIS carried out at the OCV of the cells and after 1, 5, and 10 voltammetry cycles; frequency range, 500 kHz–100 mHz; alternate voltage signal amplitude, 10 mV.
